workExamples.siteDescription: Created almost 70 modules. Migrated over 1000 'blog' posts. All forms are integrated with HubSpot. Used Lottie, Framer Motion, and CSS to create many animations and interactions. Integrates with a job post api for the job board.

image.alt: Screenshot of the homepage of the Impact Networking site.

workExamples.siteDescription: Improved number of visiters by 28% and form completions by 16%. Used Framer Motion and CSS to create multiple animations, including my favorite, the pill button hover animation.

image.alt: Screenshot of the homepage of the ePIPE site.

workExamples.siteDescription: Created a board of all available shipments for transportation, data was pulled from an api and allowed a user to request to transport the shipment

image.alt: Screenshot of the homepage of the ZMac site.

workExamples.siteDescription: Created a custom and module site for the client that allows the web site to grow with the company. The forms are integrated with HubSpot and their own api.

image.alt: Screenshot of the homepage of the Wize Load site.

workExamples.siteDescription: Used my personal WordPress starter theme to create an custom theme to meet all of the clients needs.

image.alt: Screenshot of the homepage of the Zenar site.
